Introducing

Parish Users

Track families. And let users track themselves.

Parish.es gives your parishioners access to manage their own accounts. It's designed for parishioners and administrators.
It means everyone will save lots of time on things like family record administration, donation management, ministry scheduling, event planning, and more!
Get Parish.es now

There's a catch, right?

No, it's that easy!

We've designed Parish.es to be a modern web application. That means giving users access to their own data.
For parishes, in particular, this means users should be able to see what ministries they're involved with, manage upcoming schedules, and have transparent access to financial data—all from a single, easy-to-use dashboard.
We think Parish.es can save you time and headaches. Try now to see!
